## Welcome to my personal website!

Hello, I am Trevor Nederlof, a Senior Solutions Engineer at [Sourcegraph](https://sourcegraph.com/), where I partner with software engineers at a variety of organizations to get the most out of [Amp](https://ampcode.com/), our agile coding tool.

To learn more about me, visit my [About page](/about.qmd).

To learn more about the projects I'm working on and the technologies I'm interested in, visit my [thoughts feed](/thoughts.qmd).
